data.text:
The United States False Lashes Market size is predicted to attain a valuation of USD 57.98 Billion in 2023, showing a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10.41 percent from 2024 to 2031. Estimates place this value at USD 104.98 Billion by 2031.

The consumer goods sector also demonstrates resilience, supported by strong consumer spending. Each type of market is evolving with unique drivers and trends, reflecting a dynamic landscape in the U.S. economy.
